welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kapolei, a beautiful city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to relax, explore, and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Interisland Terminal
terminals.description: The interisland terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves flights between the Hawaiian islands.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

airports.airport_name: Kaneohe Bay MCAS (Marion E. Carl Field) Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport, serving both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
